90°

related_questions.question: Soal matematika wajib pat kelas 10 beserta kunci jawabanya,,tolong bantuanya kak​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Ukuran sudut 210 0 kalau dinyatakan dalam radian adalah....

A. π rad. D. π rad.

B. π rad. E. π rad

C. π rad.

Jawaban B

2. Diketahui g(x) = 2x + 3 dan f(x) = x 2 – 4x + 6, maka

(fog)(x) = ….

A. 2x 2 -8x + 12 D. 4x 2 + 4x + 15

B. 2x 2 – 8x + 15 E. 4x 2 + 4x + 27

C. 4x 2 + 4x + 3

Jawaban C

3. Nilai x dan y yang memenuhi sistem persamaan

y = 2x – 3 dan 3x – 4y = 7 adalah.....

A. x = -1 dan y = 2 D. x = -1 dan y = -2

B. x = -1 dan y = -1 E. x = -1 dan y = 1

C. x = 1 dan y = -1

Jawaban C

4. Jika ƒ(x) = 3x – 5 dan g(x) = 6 – x – x 2 , maka

ƒ(x) – g(x) = ....

A. x 2 + 4x – 11 D. x 2 – 5x + 10

B. x 2 + 4x + 11 E. x 2 + 5x – 10

C. –x 2 – 4x – 11

Jawaban A

5. Nilai x yang memenuhi pertidaksamaan adalah...

A. –1 x5 D. x 1 atau x

B. 1 x 5 E. x5

C. –1 x 5

Jawaban D

I recently moved to another town. I was very anxious on the first day I didn't know anyone. I went to the classroom and entered the room. While I was entering the room, I felt that everybody's eyes were on me I became even more anxious then. Fortunately, Mrs. Dian, the civic teacher, was right behind me. She greeted me and introduced me to the class. It turned out that my classmates were friendly. They showed me around and helped me get to know the school. At the end of the day, I was less and less anxious. I will always remember my first day at my school. Posted by Rafi

related_questions.question: Diketahui (fog)(x) = 6x + 7 dan f(x) = 2x + 3, tentukan fungsi g(x)!​

answers.answer:
Jawab:

Diketahui : [tex](fog)(x)=6x+7[/tex]  dan [tex]f(x)=2x+3[/tex]

ditanya : [tex]g(x)=....?[/tex]

Penyelesaian :

[tex](fog)(x)=f(g(x))\\\\6x+7=2\ .\ g(x)+3\\\\6x+7=2\ g(x)+3\\\\6x+7-3=2\ g(x)\\\\6x+4=2\ g(x)\\\\2\ g(x)=6x+4\\\\g(x)=\frac{6x+4}{2}\\\\g(x)=\frac{2(3x+2)}{2}\\\\g(x)=3x+2\\\\sehingga\ diperoleh\ g(x)=3x+2[/tex]
